title: The Teemoing Shop Gifting
body:
Hello, so I recently saw that the personal discount (In this case Teemoing) shop had returned. I want to gift my friend an offer they have in their Teemoing shop; do I have to pay the normal amount of RP or is it discounted by the same amount as in the Teemoing shop?

Thanks,
Solis Deus

replies.body:
Don't worry, the price has not changed!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
What do you mean by that? Do I have to pay the discounted or normal price?
You have to pay the normal price...
Is there like an official rioter comment? I just want to be sure before I gift...
I am not a Riot employee but I'm pretty sure the price is the same. Anyway, the game will show you the price before you buy what you want.

I would say it would be easier to get them the RP so they can then use it in their shop.

you could also try sending a support ticket asking them that and hope they reply in time.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

Make sure to pick “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and then “Games and Features -> General Questions”

The Teemoing shop is personalized specifically to each account, and it wouldn't be possible to gift the discount.  I do like the point about gifting your friend RP so they can take advantage of their own personalized shop!  Hope that helps clear things up!
If you want to gift someone something they have discounted in their own personal store, you will have to pay full price for it. The discount only applies for the account itself, not for gifts.
